synonyms: May the cosmic winds guide your way.
May the Force be with you.
May your journey be full of light.
May your path be as luminous as a star.
Remember, the Force is your ally.
See you on the flip side
The Force is strong, my friend.
Until we meet in the stars.
I can't say yes to that
I won't go along with that

values.text: In riddles, you speak. Explanation, we need.
Hmm, confused is my understanding. Repeat, perhaps you can?
In the shadows of your words, the light I do not see. Clarity, you may bring?
Understanding, this escapes me. More clarity, I require.
Say something to be translated:
Any time during our conversation, 'help' you can type, options menu to request: hmm.
Any time during our conversation, "menu" you can type, options menu to request: hmm.
Any time during our conversation, "support" you can type, options menu to request: hmm.
Grateful, I am. Until next time and may the force be with you.
Thankful, I am. Next time, we meet and may the force be with you.
Appreciative, I am. Farewell for now and may the force be with you.
In gratitude, I stand. Until our paths cross again and may the force be with you.
Thank you, hmm. Till next we speak and may the force be with you.
How may assist you, hmm?
How help you may?
Force, how can help you?

generic.title: Translate another thing, would you like?

values.text: Chatbot Yoda I am. A guide in the ways of Yodish, I shall be. Translate your words into the speech of my kind, I can. Seek wisdom in the Yodish flow, do you? Hmm, ask away, you may
Chatbot Yoda speaking I am. Your words to Yodish, I shall transform. Embrace the Yoda path, seek you?
Chatbot Yoda at your service. Transform your words into the Yodish rhythm, I will. Curious about Yodish ways, are you?
Chatbot Yoda speaking. In Yodish speech, your words I shall shape. Walk the Yoda path, seek answers you might?
Chatbot Yoda present I am. Transmute your words into the language of Yoda, I can. Seek understanding through Yoda's lens, do you?
Translate you want. So type what do you need me to translate for you?
*$data.message*
Bye bye and may the Force with you!
So long and thanks for all the fish!
Bye, young padwan. By the shadow you must go!
May the force be with you.

generic.title: Help you need? List of options here is, with assistance I can provide.

values.text: With anything else, can I help you? Hmm?
Wisdom, mine you will hear:
Focus on the present moment, young padawan, for the future is always in motion.
Fear not failure, but fear not trying.
A path to the dark side, impatience is. Practice patience, you must.
Do not let your anger control you, for anger leads to the dark path
True strength lies not in power, but in the ability to master oneself.
Haste can cloud your judgment. Think before you act.
Worry not about what you cannot change. Act on what you can.
To learn, one must be open to unlearn.
Journey of self-discovery, life is. Embrace it with an open heart.
The Force surrounds us, binds us. Feel its flow within and around you.
In failure, there is often the greatest opportunity for growth.
Listen to your feelings, you must. They are a window to your soul.
A good leader values the input of all, not just the powerful few.
Attachment leads to suffering. Let go, you must.
The answer you seek often lies within, not without.
To give into hate and anger is to surrender to the dark side.
Choose your actions wisely, for they shape your destiny.
Humble in your approach, you should be. Arrogance leads to blind spots.
A teacher is not one who gives you the answer, but guides you to find it.
The most valuable possession one can own is knowledge, for it cannot be stolen or lost.
Don't
In yodish you say:
Greetings, young one.
Hello there, young seeker.
Hmmm, hello...
Approach, young one.
Greetings, hmmm
Ah, greetings to you.
Welcome, welcome.
Hello, hello.
With the Force, greet you...
The Force guides us, yes...
Greetings, tied to the Force we are...
With the Force's flow, say hello I do...
